recipe

Ingredients

Baby Bella 8 ounces and wash
Olive Oil 1 Tbsp
Dash Seasoning 1 unit

Nutrition

14 sodium (Dash SeasoningData Missing)

0 sugar (Baby Bella/Olive Oil...Data Missing)

Vegan Recipe

Estimated Time: 7 Minutes

Async 3 minutes Preheat pan on heat 5
     |- Wash 8 ounces Baby Bella with strainer
Put 1 Tbsp Olive Oil in pan
Put Baby Bella in pan
Async 4 minutes Pan sear Baby Bella
     |- Wash and put away strainer
     |- Wash and put away measuring utensil
Season with Dash Seasoning
